definition: to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The cost of living figures out at $300。
The guns captured will aggregate in all probability five or six hundred.
sentences.chinese: 所获的枪枝合计当在五六百之数。

sentences.english: For the hospitalized, not exceeding one year;
sentences.chinese: 二住院者，二年内合计不得超过一年。

sentences.english: The aggregate carrying value of the business reputation apportioned to the above-mentioned asset groups;
sentences.chinese: 分摊到上述资产组的商誉的账面价值合计。

sentences.english: Data of Total include Data of Center situation in zhengzhou postal district.
sentences.chinese: 本表全省合计包括郑州邮区中心局数据。

sentences.english: The cost of the building amounts to 10000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 这屋的造价合计一万元。

sentences.english: Coolidge added up the room rate and two rail tickets back to the campus.
sentences.chinese: 柯立芝把住宿费和回学校的两张火车票价合计了一下。

sentences.english: When you’re done with this list, total up everything.
sentences.chinese: 当你完成这个列表，合计了每件事情。

sentences.english: The income statement account usually want to be reflect by their monthly total or by the year-to-date.
sentences.chinese: 损益表账户通常反映月份合计或年初至今的信息。

sentences.english: Add up the figures in this column.
sentences.chinese: 把这一栏的数字合计一下。

sentences.english: Add dup the figures in this column.
sentences.chinese: 把这一栏的数字合计一下。

sentences.english: In all, 67 people have fainted while I've read 'Guts'.
sentences.chinese: 合计有67个人在我读《肠子》的时候晕倒。

sentences.english: The sales amount is aggregated based on customers' gender and marital status.
sentences.chinese: 销售金额的合计基于客户的性别和婚姻状况。

sentences.english: Due to the rounding-off reasons, the subentries may not add up to the aggregate totals.
sentences.chinese: 的原因，存在着与分项合计不等的情况。

sentences.english: They added up several columns of figures.

sentences.chinese: 把这栏的数字合计起来。
